description.narrative:
Stödet till den oberoende medieorganisationen Hromadske TV kommer att bidra till att bygga en mer tillåtande miljö för fri och professionell media i Ukraina och ett mer pluralistiskt medielandskap. Som del i strategin att omvandla Hromadske TV till en mer hållbar medieorganisation kommer samarbetsparten inom ramen för det föreslagna projektet under 2017-2018 att fokusera på att tillhandahålla pluralistiska nyheter och annan typ av program samt utöka sin publik på flera plattformar. Detta kommer att göras genom ökad distribuering, förbättrad kvalitet på Hromadske TV:s produktion samt förbättrad satsning på marknadsföring. Förutom att stärka sin egen kapacitet kommer organisationen att lägga fokus på att stärka strategiska partnerskap, främst med den nyetablerade offentliga mediekanalen UA:First. Samarbetspartens nyhetsredaktion och enhet för visuell produktion och tekniska tjänster ska omvandlas och stärkas. Utöver detta kommer Hromadske TV att optimera de ledningsstrukturer som arbetar för att förbättra organisationens strategiska utveckling.
*****
Grant project to support an independent media outlet Hromadske TV would contribute to building a more enabling environment for free and professional media in Ukraine and more pluralistic media landscape. Throughout the Grant support in 2017-2018 the cooperation partner will focus on providing pluralistic news and other types of programming, and expand audiences on various platforms, as part of strategic transformation of Hromadske Television into a more sustainable media outlet. This will be achieved through enhancing distribution, as well as through improved quality of Hromadske’s news output, and enhanced marketing. Apart from increasing its own capacity, the organization will also focus on strengthening startegic partnerships, primarily with the newly established national public broadcaster UA:First. The cooperation partner will also transform and strengthen its newsroom, visual production unit and technical service, and will optimize the governance structure striving to enhance the strategic development of the organization.

To ensure continuous production of independent, pluralistic news and other types of programming, and expand audiences on various platforms, as part of strategic transformation of Hromadske Television, before the criteria for Core Support are fulfilled.

The development intervention's intended outcome is to contribute to building a more enabling environment for free and professional media in Ukraine and more pluralistic media landscape via support to an independent media outlet Hromadske TV. Throughout the Grant support in 2017-2018 the cooperation partner will focus on providing pluralistic news and other types of programming, and expand audiences on various platforms, as part of strategic transformation of Hromadske Television into a more sustainable media outlet. This will be achieved through enhancing distribution, as well as through improved quality of Hromadske’s news output, and enhanced marketing. Apart from increasing its own capacity, the organization will also focus on strengthening startegic partnerships, primarily with the newly established national public broadcaster UA:First. The cooperation partner will also transform and strengthen its newsroom, visual production unit and technical service, and will optimize the governance structure striving to enhance the strategic development of the organization.
